body: How about `if (pretty_name) var.pretty_name() = pretty_name;`? Might be faster in case `pretty_name` is NULL (which is most of the time) because it won't have to run `operator=` and additional constructor.
body_html: How about if (pretty_name) var.pretty_name() = pretty_name;? Might be faster in case pretty_name is NULL (which is most of the time) because it won't have to run operator= and additional constructor.
body_text: How about if (pretty_name) var.pretty_name() = pretty_name;? Might be faster in case pretty_name is NULL (which is most of the time) because it won't have to run operator= and additional constructor.
